title: Data Size Count
description: This is a VS Code extension which helps to show the number of line and words count in a selected text and also give the array and object size of the selected Json.
techStack: Typescript, Node, VS Code extension API

title: Fake Response Server
description: A simple mock server which helps generate local mock server with dynamic middleware, delays, proxy ect.. . This is package is also available in npm and in VS Code extensions.
techStack: Typescript, Node, Express JS, Lodash, Axios, Url-pattern, VS Code extension API

title: Virtual Network System Protocol - VNSP
description: A Web app tool to allocate or configure bandwidth for the specific customer

title: Canvas Application
description: A Task management tool which helps to assign, suspend task tc.. for the internal purpose.

title: Ace Tool
description: It is an import and export tool to transfer data between JSON to google sheet and vise versa. The content author provide the content in the google sheet which will then converted to a json object to run the online education tool.
client: An American Research And Development Team of Lexia group of companies
techStack: Electron, Node, ECMA script, HTML5, SCSS

title: What To Do
description: What To Do is a tool which helps you to track your daily task and its status. This tool will carry over the previous days task to current date if the task is not completed. Your task details can be exported to excel.
techStack: React, Node, Kendo UI, Typescript, Express, OverNight JS.

title: Powerup - Online Educational Tool
description: An online english language communication education tool. The content author provide their content in the third party tool called Contentfull. Using Contentfull API we provide data service to the tool and run the application.
client: An American Research And Development Team of Lexia group of company
techStack: React, Typescript, ContentFull API, Node, File Systems, MongoDB, Dynamic Form Binding, Modal Creation

title: Incentive Pay Management
description: A tool to manage the incentive pay for the customers across different regions. The region admin can configure different constraints for their legacy customer like increasing the incentive per hour basis or by speed basis
techStack: Angular 7, bootstrap, Json-server, MongoDB, Java springboot, PrimeNg, ChartJS, Dashboards, PDF Export, Report Generation.

title: Email Template Editing Tool
description: A tool similar to word press which helps to build a standard Email Template

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Build a standard Email Templates for different clients which is compatible for all different browsers and versions
techStack: HTML5, CSS3, Photoshop, Invision, Bootstrap, Jquery.
